response.pipeline: gst-launch-1.0 rtspsrc location=rtsp://test ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! x264enc bitrate=100 ! kvssink
response.symptoms: video has pixelation and blocky artifacts
diagnosed_problems: Pixelation detected - likely bitrate too low or encoder settings suboptimal
Encoding artifacts - review encoder settings, bitrate, and GOP structure
prevention_tips: Test with different encoder settings and bitrates
Verify color space conversions with videoconvert elements
Use hardware encoders when available for better quality

response.pipeline: gst-launch-1.0 rtspsrc location=rtsp://camera ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! autovideosink
response.symptoms: How do I fix green screen artifacts in my RTSP pipeline?
diagnosed_problems: Green screen artifacts - possible color space conversion issue or hardware decoder problem
Encoding artifacts - review encoder settings, bitrate, and GOP structure
solutions: the environment variable `GST_PLUGIN_PATH`. ## Pipeline Description A pipeline consists of *elements* and *links*. *Elements* can be put into *bins* of different sorts.
prevention_tips: Test with different encoder settings and bitrates
Verify color space conversions with videoconvert elements
Use hardware encoders when available for better quality
